person_say: I've been having problems with my friends at school, and it's stressing me out.
animal_say: That’s tough! How do these issues with friends make you feel? Any thoughts on what might help?

person_say: It's really making me feel anxious and sad. I think talking to them might help, but I'm not sure how to start.
animal_say: I totally hear you! There’s a gentle bear named Bruno who specializes in stress management. Want to meet him?

person_say: Yes, meeting Bruno sounds great! I would love to get some advice on managing my stress.
animal_say: Awesome! Bruno will guide you through relaxing techniques to help with your stress. Let’s go see him!
